verses.name: Mark 5:10
verses.text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country.

verses.name: Mark 5:11
verses.text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding.

verses.name: Mark 5:12
verses.text: And all the devils besought him, saying, Send us into the swine, that we may enter into them.

verses.name: Mark 5:13
verses.text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave. And the unclean spirits went out, and entered into the swine: and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea, (they were about two thousand;) and were choked in the sea.
